Package com.chatapp.database

Class DatabaseManager

java.lang.Object
com.chatapp.database.DatabaseManager
public class DatabaseManager extends Object
The DatabaseManager class provides a concrete implementation for interacting with the database of the Chat Application, handling operations related to users and chat rooms.

Key functionalities include:

  • Establishing a database connection
  • CRUD operations for registered users
  • Fetching user data based on authentication and username
  • Managing the online status of users
  • Associating and dissociating users from chat rooms
  • CRUD operations for chat rooms

Important: This class utilizes raw JDBC operations. It does not implement ORM or connection pooling. Ensure judicious handling of database connections to prevent potential connection leaks.

Author:
Prutha Upadhyay

  • Constructor Details

    • DatabaseManager

      public DatabaseManager()
      Provides the initialization and setup for the DatabaseManager. During instantiation, this ensures that a connection to the database can be established.

  • Method Details

    • getConnection

      public Connection getConnection()
      Establishes and returns a connection to the Chat Application database.
      Returns:
      A valid database connection.
      Throws:
      RuntimeException - if there's an error connecting to the database.

    • storeRegisteredUser

      public void storeRegisteredUser(RegisterUser user)
      Stores the provided user's data into the User table of the database.
      Parameters:
      user - The RegisterUser object containing user details to be stored.

    • fetchUserByUsernameAndPassword

      public RegisterUser fetchUserByUsernameAndPassword(String username, String password)
      Fetches a registered user from the database based on the provided username and password.
      Parameters:
      username - The username to search for.
      password - The associated password to the username.
      Returns:
      A RegisterUser object containing the fetched user details, or null if not found.

    • fetchUserByUsername

      public RegisterUser fetchUserByUsername(String username)
      Fetches a user from the database based on the provided username.
      Parameters:
      username - The username to search for.
      Returns:
      A RegisterUser object containing the fetched user details, or null if not found.

    • updateUserOnlineStatus

      public void updateUserOnlineStatus(RegisterUser user)
      Updates the online status of the given user in the database.
      Parameters:
      user - The RegisterUser object whose online status needs to be updated.

    • insertUserToChatRoom

      public void insertUserToChatRoom(int userId, int chatRoomId)
      Inserts a user into a specific chat room in the database.
      Parameters:
      userId - The ID of the user to be inserted.
      chatRoomId - The ID of the chat room where the user needs to be added.

    • removeUserFromChatRoom

      public void removeUserFromChatRoom(int userId, int chatRoomId)
      Removes a user from a specific chat room in the database.
      Parameters:
      userId - The ID of the user to be removed.
      chatRoomId - The ID of the chat room from which the user needs to be removed.

    • fetchChatRooms

      public List<ChatRoom> fetchChatRooms()
      Fetches a list of all chat rooms from the database.
      Returns:
      A List of ChatRoom objects representing all the chat rooms.

    • createChatRoom

      public int createChatRoom(ChatRoom chatRoom, int loggedInUserId)
      Inserts a new chat room into the database.
      Parameters:
      chatRoom -
      loggedInUserId -
      Returns:
      int The ChatRoom object that needs to be inserted.

    • getChatRoomById

      public ChatRoom getChatRoomById(int chatRoomId)
      Retrieves a specific chat room based on its ID from the database.
      Parameters:
      chatRoomId - The ID of the chat room to fetch.
      Returns:
      A ChatRoom object representing the fetched chat room, or null if not found.
